HullCheckDescriptions.success: The NPC becomes Impaired until the end of their next turn.
HullCheckDescriptions.fail: The NPC becomes Jammed until the end of their next turn.

glancing_blow.title: Glancing Blow
glancing_blow.description: The damage is notable but the effects are minor, and the NPC is Impaired until the end of their next turn.

system_failure.title: System Failure
system_failure.description: The hit was sufficient to disrupt the NPC's systems, forcing them to pass a Hull check or become Jammed until the end of their next turn. On a success, they become Impaired instead. If the NPC was already Impaired, they automatically fail this save.

staggering_hit.title: Staggering Hit
staggering_hit.description: The NPC chooses; either they become Stunned until the end of their next turn, or they become Impaired and Slowed for the rest of the scene. If they choose the second option, it can't be chosen again for the rest of the scene.

emergency_shunt.title: Emergency Shunt
emergency_shunt.description: The NPC overheats but emergency safeties kick in, and they become is Impaired until the end of their next turn.

instability.title: Instability
instability.description: The NPC becomes Exposed as their reactor becomes unstable, causing emergency vents to visibly open and weakening their armor.

meltdown.title: Meltdown
meltdown.description: The NPC suffers a reactor meltdown at the end of their next turn.
